title: Manage Offshore Platform Bed Space
description: A logistics planner manages the allocation of limited bed space (POB - Personnel on Board) on an offshore platform for an upcoming maintenance campaign.

tasks.description: Determine the number of extra personnel required for the maintenance campaign and for how long.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of required personnel and their stay durations is compiled.

tasks.description: Check the platform's bed space availability for the planned campaign dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows a conflict, with not enough beds available for the peak week.

tasks.description: Adjust the maintenance schedule or personnel mobilization dates to resolve the bed space conflict.
tasks.expected_outcome: The schedule is revised to smooth out the personnel peak, resolving the conflict.
